content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No persistent structures have been successfully added to the map. Multiple attempts were made to place a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) – intended for supplying Automation Science Packs to research – but none succeeded due to recurring crafting and placement issues. Although the agent referenced existing furnace entities (one at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) used for iron smelting and another at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) for copper plate production), no new structures have been created by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
• Incorrect API usage for entity retrieval:
 – When using get_entities, avoid unsupported keyword parameters (such as 'radius') and extra positional arguments. Conform to the defined function signature.
 – Validate the return value of get_entities before iterating; if it may be None, implement a fallback to an empty list.
• Lab crafting and placement issues:
 – Ensure that all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper cables) are available before attempting to craft a Lab.
 – Verify that a Lab has been successfully crafted and is present in the inventory prior to initiating any placement actions.
 – Review the full resource and production chain to prevent shortages that lead to subsequent crafting errors.
